testcase.brief: Unit Test 0102: Wireless clients connected to wifi0/wifi1 should be able to access Internet via AP.
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: After WANAddressing_UnitTest_ConfigCLI_1
Test Procedure: config Wifi SSID on AP. CLI commands: ssid test interface wifi1 ssid test save config

step.telnet:
-v "vlan ${br1.vlan1}" -v "interface vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server enable"
-v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} switchport mode access" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} switchport access vlan ${br1.vlan1}" -v "dns server-ip ${pub.dns1.ip}"

step.desc: br1.vpc1 show ip address got from mgt0 dhcp client

step.telnet: -v "_ff dst-ip ${br1.br.fw_lan.gw} protocol 1 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log all"

step.log-match: -b "(?i)\(o\) mux0 ${br1.br.fw_lan.gw}->${br1.vpc1.tif.ip}.*icmp-echo-reply" -ps p "(?i)\(i\) vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} ${br1.br.fw_lan.gw}->${br1.vpc1.tif.ip}.*icmp-echo-reply" p "(?i)\(i\) ${br1.br.wan.kport1} ${br1.br.fw_lan.gw}->${br1.br.wan.ip}.*icmp-echo-reply" p "(?i)\(o\) mux0 ${br1.br.wan.ip}->${br1.br.fw_lan.gw}.*icmp-echo-req" p "(?i)\(u\) vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip}->${br1.br.fw_lan.gw}.*icmp-echo-req" p "(?i)ip forward: ip pkt with dst-ip ${br1.br.fw_lan.gw} received on ${br1.br.lan.kport1}" -e "\(i\) ${br1.br.lan.kport1} ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip}->${br1.br.fw_lan.gw}.*icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
